item.title: Summary of Cryptography Exam 2
item.author: m0r4a@proton.me (Gael Mora)
item.description: This post is a rewrite of the summary document provided by the professor that includes only the topics from exam 2.

item.title: Does Max need more storage?
item.author: m0r4a@proton.me (Gael Mora)
item.description: In this post I discuss whether Max really needs more storage or not.

item.title: Python Quick Guide
item.author: m0r4a@proton.me (Gael Mora)
item.description: This is another test post in which I give a really simple and brief python guide

item.title: The History of Linux

item.description: This is a post where I summarize the history of linux, it is a test post.

item.title: Local Network Switching - Final Project
item.author: m0r4a@proton.me (Gael Mora)
item.description: This was my final project of the local network switching class, it is a document about the implementation of all the topics seen during the semester.
